title: AIVTuber
summary: A prototype of an AI virtual YouTuber
description: This project aims to create a realistic and interactive AI virtual YouTuber using deep learning and computer vision techniques.

title: Questionnaire Management System
description: This project allows users to create and manage surveys for various purposes. It supports different question types, templates, and designs. It also provides real-time analysis and reports of the responses.

title: MusicRecommender
summary: A music recommendation system based on user preferences and emotions
description: This project uses machine learning and natural language processing to recommend music to users based on their preferences and emotions. It also allows users to rate and comment on the songs.
